Dear Liverpool FC supporters,

We are delighted to announce that we have reached an agreement with Borussia Dortmund for the transfer of Jude Bellingham. The young midfielder has agreed to join us on a long-term contract and will join up with his new teammates when the transfer window opens in the summer.

Bellingham is one of the most promising young players in the world and we are thrilled to have secured his signature. He has already shown his quality at the highest level, having made his professional debut for Dortmund at just 17 years old.

Jürgen Klopp, Liverpool FC manager, said: "Jude is an exciting young player with a big future ahead of him. I am looking forward to working with him and helping him develop his talent at Liverpool."

Bellingham said: "I am delighted to have signed for Liverpool FC. It is a dream come true to be joining one of the biggest clubs in the world. I can't wait to get started and give everything for the Reds."

We would like to welcome Jude and his family to the Liverpool FC family and look forward to seeing him in action for the Reds.

Yours sincerely,
Liverpool FC
